description: Droll numbers: sum of even prime divisors equals sum of odd prime divisors.
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = {if (n % 2, return (0)); f = factor(n); return (2*f[1,2] == sum(i=2, #f~, f[i,1]*f[i,2]));} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 21 2013
author: Mario Velucchi (mathchess(AT)velucchi.it)
